characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Paliah is one of the ten Heralds of the Almighty. She is associated with the number Palah, the essence pulp, the gemstone emerald, and the divine attributes of Learned and Giving. She is the patron Herald of the order of Knights Radiant known as Truthwatchers.
She is referred to as Pailiah in Vorinism.
